mapper.select: SELECT p.indica_cd, p.prcs_cd, r.prcs_nm, p.prod_cnt, i.edcts_cd, prdt_nm FROM prcs_prog p JOIN prcs r ON p.prcs_cd = r.prcs_cd JOIN indica_dtl i ON p.indica_cd = i.indica_cd JOIN edcts e ON e.edcts_cd = i.edcts_cd WHERE LENGTH(p.prcs_status) = 4 ORDER BY prcs_cd
SELECT prcs_insp_cd, prcs_insp_nm, prcs_insp_std FROM prcs_insp_std WHERE prcs_cd = #{prcsCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prcs_insp_dtl ( prcs_chk_cd, prcs_cd, prcs_nm, edcts_cd, prdt_nm, prod_cnt, prcs_insp_dt, prcs_insp_mng, prcs_insp_cd, prcs_insp_nm, prcs_insp_std, prcs_insp_rst, prcs_insp_jdg ) VALUES( #{prcsChkCd}, #{prcsCd}, #{prcsNm}, #{edctsCd}, #{prdtNm}, #{prodCnt}, #{prcsInspDt}, #{prcsInspMng}, #{prcsInspCd}, #{prcsInspNm}, #{prcsInspStd}, #{prcsInspRst}, #{prcsInspJdg} )
